summary: The code is importing the ZexUI module from zexui_lib and creating an instance of it named "zex". The script then uses this instance to click on an image named "tx_5.PNG" located at "C:\Users\abhis\Desktop\", though scrolling down may be required beforehand, followed by finding the text 'File' and double-left clicking on it using the zex instance.

details.comment: The code is importing the ZexUI module from zexui_lib and creating an instance of it named "zex". The script then uses this instance to click on an image named "tx_5.PNG" located at "C:\Users\abhis\Desktop\", though scrolling down may be required beforehand, followed by finding the text 'File' and double-left clicking on it using the zex instance.
details.content:
from zexui_lib.zexui import ZexUI
# import zexui_lib.zexui
zex = ZexUI()
# zex.text('Document Writer').click()
zex.image(r"C:\\Users\\abhis\\Desktop\\tx_5.PNG").click()
# scroll_down()
# zex.text('File').findTopOf().mouseDoubleLeftClick()
